sourcesContent:
import "./sm.css" export default function Sm10() { return (

Your right to be rich

  • Do not have negative thoughts towards money - do not criticise money and call it the root of all evil
  • Use the following statements several times a day - ” I like money, I love it, I use it wisely, constructively and judiciously. Money is constantly circulating in my life. I release it with joy and it returns to me multiplied in a wonderful way. It is good and very good. Money flows to me in avalanches of abundance, I use it for good only and I am greatful for the riches of my mind
  • Do not make a god of money. It is only a symbol remember the real riches are in your mind. You are here to lead a balanced life - this includes acquiring all the money you need.
  • Don’t make money your sole aim claim wealth, happiness, peace, true expression and love and personally radiate love and good will to all
) }
